axiom df-orng(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5, setvar s6) {
  ⊢ oRing = { s0 ∈(Ring ⋂ oGrp)|[(Base ` s0)/ s1][(0 ` s0)/ s2][(× ` s0)/ s3][(le ` s0)/ s4]∀(s5 ∈ s1, ∀(s6 ∈ s1,((s2[s4]s5 ∧ s2[s4]s6)→ s2[s4](s5[s3]s6))))}
  ⊣ d(s5, s6)
  ⊣ d(s4, s5)
  ⊣ d(s0, s5)
  ⊣ d(s3, s5)

  ⊣ d(s0, s4)

  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
}

blocks.content: In an ordered ring, multiplication with a positive does not change strict comparison. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 9-Apr-2018.)

blocks.content: Every subfield of an ordered field is also an ordered field. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 21-Jan-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm subofld(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cofld), wcel(co(c0, cress, c1), cfield)), wcel(co(c0, cress, c1), cofld))
} = {
  sylanbrc(wa(wcel(c0, cofld), wcel(co(c0, cress, c1), cfield)), wcel(co(c0, cress, c1), cofld), wcel(co(c0, cress, c1), cfield), wcel(co(c0, cress, c1), corng))
  syl2anc(wa(wcel(c0, cofld), wcel(co(c0, cress, c1), cfield)), wcel(co(c0, cress, c1), corng), wcel(c0, corng), wcel(co(c0, cress, c1), crg))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cofld), wcel(co(c0, cress, c1), cfield), wcel(c0, corng))
  simprbi(wcel(c0, cofld), wcel(c0, corng), wcel(c0, cfield))
  isofld(c0)
  3syl(wa(wcel(c0, cofld), wcel(co(c0, cress, c1), cfield)), wcel(co(c0, cress, c1), crg), wcel(co(c0, cress, c1), cfield), wcel(co(c0, cress, c1), ccrg))
  simpr(wcel(c0, cofld), wcel(co(c0, cress, c1), cfield))
  simprbi(wcel(co(c0, cress, c1), cfield), wcel(co(c0, cress, c1), ccrg), wcel(co(c0, cress, c1), cdr))
  isfld(co(c0, cress, c1))
  crngring(co(c0, cress, c1))
  suborng(c0, c1)
  isofld(co(c0, cress, c1))
}

thm subofld(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ oField ∧(c0[|`s]c1)∈ Field)→(c0[|`s]c1)∈ oField)
} = {
  sylanbrc((c0 ∈ oField ∧(c0[|`s]c1)∈ Field), (c0[|`s]c1)∈ oField, (c0[|`s]c1)∈ Field, (c0[|`s]c1)∈ oRing)
